data.title: No customer service
data.text: Was there for a work event. Had a reservation. Got relegated to the corner when other people arrived. Spoke to the manager and his manager and got no relief. We were there to spend money and to bring business to this establishment. Now we have vowed never to set foot in this place again.

data.title: Band Night
data.text: It was great night the to be there with lots of people and a band playing.  You can get food up there too.

data.title: Nice Spot in Downtown Newark
data.text:
I went here on a Saturday night for a birthday gathering. From the time of arrival until the time we left, the service was excellent! Thank you Keisha! You were awesome! 
The space is somewhat accommodating inside with the outdoor terrace being a bit narrow. To move around outside, it was somtimes necessary to step inside to go around. The immediate view was of downtown Newark. The old Prudential building and the Prudential Center. Far away in the distance there is a view of lower manhattan and the Freedom Tower. 
The drinks were okay, but were served in plastic cups. Didnt like that at all. Everything in plastic cups: wine, sangria, cocktail and shots all in plastic cups. 
Had some finger bar food that was just okay. 
My overall rating is excellent because of the service and the time had with friends.

data.title: Awesome Views
data.text: Visited this rooftop lounge for Mother's Day and had an awesome time.  Stunning views and great atmosphere.  Great drinks and appetizers. The bartender Latika is wonderful.  I just wish they stayed open a little later. They closed to early.
